hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Stone of Agony#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #4# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Deku Scrub Lobby Rear

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Fell for it, didn't you, fool? Junk hint cross split attack!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Epona's Song# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks. Except, apparently, the big rock blocking Dodongo's Cavern.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Boomerang Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest
Bottom of the Well MQ Dead Hand Freestanding Key

ToT (Left).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Game Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #6# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #5# major items.
